CallDisposition.name: CallDisposition
CallDisposition.description: Represents a call result value that sales reps select when logging a call.

Disposition.description: The result of a phone call, such as whether a call was connected or the rep left a voicemail.

DispositionCategoryId.description: The related call outcome that is used in reports and branching criteria for cadences.
